alphabetsoup.base
Class BucketbotTask

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.base.BucketbotTask

public class BucketbotTask
extends java.lang.Object

BucketbotTask is a class which describes the major tasks which can be "physically" completed (physically meaning via bucketbots, buckets, and stations).

Author:
Chris Hazard

Nested Class Summary
static class BucketbotTask.TaskType
          TaskType is the type of task, and indicates the meaning of each of the fields of this class.

createTaskSTORE_BUCKET

public static BucketbotTask createTaskSTORE_BUCKET(Bucket b,
                                                   Circle bucket_storage_location)
Creates a task to tell the bucketbot to take the specified bucket

Parameters:
b - Bucket to go pick up and take to the destination location
bucket_storage_location - Circle object containing where bucket should be stored
Returns:
new BucketbotTask object containing task details

createTaskTAKE_BUCKET_TO_LETTER_STATION

public static BucketbotTask createTaskTAKE_BUCKET_TO_LETTER_STATION(Bucket b,
                                                                    Letter l,
                                                                    LetterStation ls)
Creates a task to tell the bucketbot to take a specified Bucket to a LetterStation, and get a certain Letter

Parameters:
b - Bucket to go pick up and take to the destination location
l - List of Letter specifying which letters should be taken from the LetterStation
ls - LetterStation to take the letters from
Returns:
new BucketbotTask object containing task details

createTaskTAKE_BUCKET_TO_WORD_STATION

public static BucketbotTask createTaskTAKE_BUCKET_TO_WORD_STATION(Bucket b,
                                                                  Letter l,
                                                                  WordStation ws,
                                                                  Word w)
Creates a task to tell the bucketbot to take a specified Bucket to a WordStation, and drop off specified Letters

Parameters:
b - Bucket to go pick up and take to the destination location
l - List of Letter specifying which letters should be given to the WordStation from the Bucket
ws - WordStation to give the letters to
w - Word to place Letter l into (the Word must be at WordStation ws). If null, then the first word that needs the letter will receive it.
Returns:
new BucketbotTask object containing task details
